content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Our BooksDirect service will resume from 31 January 2022. If you have any questions please contact ui-ls-booksdirect@nottingham.ac.uk. BooksDirect is a service for academic staff where loan items and interlibrary loans can be requested and delivered directly to your school. Items can also be returned using this service. It is currently available to the following schools: To place a request using BooksDirect, log in to NUsearch, find the item you wish to request and select 'BooksDirect/Personal Delivery' as the pick up location. Please contact the BooksDirect Team on 0115 95 14582 or email ui-ls-booksdirect@nottingham.ac.uk if you are interested in this service. King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
